snippet.title: Super Rolling Heroes Deluxe - Trailer
snippet.description:
STEAM
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2787720?utm_source=jandu&utm_campaign=jandushow&utm_medium=youtube

NINTENDO SWITCH
https://www.nintendo.com/es-es/Juegos/Programas-descargables-Nintendo-Switch/Super-Rolling-Heroes-Deluxe-2689868.html

PLAYSTATION 5 & PLAYSTATOIN 4
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10011078

XBOX SERIES & XBOX ONE
https://www.xbox.com/en-us/games/store/super-rolling-heroes-deluxe/9nc1f3chvdjg

Destroy, bounce, explode! Roll downhill with Super Rolling Heroes Deluxe, a 3D platformer all about maintaining momentum, pulling down every object, avoiding deadly obstacles, and collecting some nice shiny gems too.
 
Bounce and break everything as you roll downhill in this beautiful game! Play normally for a relaxed experience or push your skills to the limit in hard mode. Destroy every object while maintaining momentum, exploding, bouncing, using power-ups, and avoiding all kinds of deadly obstacles. Experience simple yet finely-tuned gameplay with numerous levels, secrets, and rewards to customize your hero.
Features:

Unlock over 100 items to customize your hero.
Learn how different objects react to your actions!.
Play through 60 amazing levels.
Choose between two difficulty modes.

More information on:
https://www.jandusoft.com/superrolling

©2024 JanduSoft & Solid Neon Games
